overview: Under the Surface is a fictional film about Lyla, a teen who dreams of becoming a professional athlete. When she's diagnosed with Type 1 diabetes, she struggles to cope with the demands of managing her illness alongside her training. Despite setbacks and an unsympathetic coach, Lyla learns to accept her illness and finds a new, supportive community. The film is an inspiring story about resilience and determination in the face of adversity, showing that even with challenges, you can still pursue your dreams and find joy in life.
title: Under the Surface
